item.title: Ex-Harvard president Larry Summers stops teaching as university investigates Epstein emails
item.description: The former US treasury secretary has faced a backlash over frequent messages to Epstein.

item.title: US military officials in Ukraine for talks on ending war
item.description: It comes amid reports the US and Russia have prepared a 28-point peace plan, allegedly containing major concessions for Ukraine.

item.title: Trump signs bill ordering justice department to release Epstein files
item.description: The bill gives the US Justice Department 30 days to release all the files in a searchable format.

item.title: Paris court blocks auction of earliest-known calculator
item.description: The court blocked La Pascaline, a 400-year-old calculating machine, from being exported from France.

item.title: Why Wales fell out of love with Labour
item.description: After the Caerphilly by-election, Labour faces its toughest task yet in Wales - convincing voters to keep believing, ahead of the 2026 Senedd election
